      • FromTexture

        public static PAGSurface FromTexture(int textureID,
                                     int width,
                                     int height)
        Create a PAGSurface from specified OpenGL texture, return null if there is no current OpenGL context or the texture is invalid. Note: 1.The target of texture must be GL_TEXTURE_2D. 2.PAG will use (not shareGroup) current OpenGL Context directly. 3.Must call PAGSurface.release() before destroy OpenGL context manually, otherwise memory will leak. 4.Texture should not bind to any frameBuffer.

      • FromTexture

        public static PAGSurface FromTexture(int textureID,
                                     int width,
                                     int height,
                                     boolean flipY)
        Create a PAGSurface from specified OpenGL texture, return null if there is no current OpenGL context or the texture is invalid. Note: 1.The target of texture must be GL_TEXTURE_2D. 2.PAG will use (not shareGroup) current OpenGL Context directly. 3.Must call PAGSurface.release() before destroy OpenGL context manually, otherwise memory will leak. 4.Texture should not bind to any frameBuffer.

      • SetupFromTexture

                                    int width,

                                    boolean flipY)

      • width

        public int width()
        The width of surface in pixels.

      • height

        public int height()
        The height of surface in pixels.

      • updateSize

        public void updateSize()
        Update the size of surface, and reset the internal surface.

      • present

        public boolean present()
        [Deprecated](Please use PAGPlayer.flush() instead) Apply all changes to the surface. Returns true if the content has changed.

      • clearAll

        public boolean clearAll()
        Erases all pixels of this surface with transparent color. Returns true if the content has changed.

      • freeCache

        public void freeCache()
        Free the cache created by the surface immediately. Call this method can reduce memory pressure.

      • release

        public void release()
        Free up resources used by the PAGSurface instance immediately instead of relying on the garbage collector to do this for you at some point in the future.

        protected void finalize()
